SEARCH
Package AcademicExchangePlatform.dao

Interface CourseDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
CourseDAOImpl
public interface CourseDAO
Data Access Object interface for managing courses in the Academic Exchange Platform. Provides methods to create, update, retrieve, and manage courses.

  • Method Details

    • createCourse

      boolean createCourse(Course course)
      Creates a new course in the database.
      Parameters:
      course - The Course object to create
      Returns:
      true if creation was successful, false otherwise

    • updateCourse

      boolean updateCourse(Course course)
      Updates an existing course.
      Parameters:
      course - The Course object containing updated details
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false otherwise

    • deleteCourse

      boolean deleteCourse(int courseId)
      Deletes a specific course.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course to delete
      Returns:
      true if deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • getCourseById

      Course getCourseById(int courseId)
      Retrieves a specific course by its ID.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course
      Returns:
      The Course object if found, null otherwise

    • getAllCourses

      List<Course> getAllCourses()
      Retrieves all courses in the system.
      Returns:
      List of all Course objects

    • getCoursesByInstitution

      List<Course> getCoursesByInstitution(int institutionId)
      Retrieves all courses for a specific institution.
      Parameters:
      institutionId - The ID of the institution
      Returns:
      List of Course objects

    • updateCourseStatus

      boolean updateCourseStatus(int courseId, CourseStatus status)
      Updates the status of a specific course.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course
      status - The new CourseStatus to set
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false otherwise

    • searchCourses

      List<Course> searchCourses(CourseSearchCriteria criteria)
      Searches for courses based on specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      criteria - The CourseSearchCriteria object containing search parameters
      Returns:
      List of matching Course objects

    • getAvailableTerms

      Set<String> getAvailableTerms()
      Retrieves all available academic terms.
      Returns:
      Set of unique term strings
